scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Paul Ehrlich, Professor of Biological Sciences and Bing Professor of Population Studies, Stanford University, discusses the present state of U.S. and Soviet nuclear forces and presents the consensus of leading scientists on the long term ecological impact of nuclear war. Includes slides of artists' impressions of nuclear war.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Delivered before an academic audience at Stanford University on November 10, 1983; televised and taped by Stanford ITV Network.
